availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ambrose L. Wright (Bath County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Bourbon County, Kentucky, native. Married to Catherine Moore in Bath County, Kentucky, on July 18, 1839. Father of William Wright, Elizabeth Wright, Margaret Wright, Caroline Wright, John Wright, Benjamin J. Wright, and Mary Bell Wright. Farmer in Bath County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Bath County in 1850. Farmer in Bath County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Bath County in 1860.
